public static int readLittleEndianInt(java.io.RandomAccessFile raf)

Reads a little-endian 32-bit integer value from the current position of a file. File position is adavanced 4 bytes.

integer value

align8

public static int align8(java.io.OutputStream out,
                         long nb)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Pads an output stream to an 8-byte boundary. On exit, a number of bytes 0<=n<8 will have been written to the supplied output stream so that its length is a multiple of 8. The number of bytes written is returned.

Parameters:
out - output stream
nb - number of bytes currently written to stream (only 3 lsbs are significant)
Returns:
number of byte that this routine has written
Throws:
java.io.IOException

ceil8

public static long ceil8(long nb)
Returns the smallest multiple of 8 that is greater than or equal to the argument.

Parameters:
nb - non-negative value
Returns:
multiple of 8

utf8Length

public static int utf8Length(java.lang.String txt)
Returns the number of UTF-8 encoded bytes that correspond to a java string. This is supposed to be faster than actually doing the encoding.

Parameters:
txt - string
Returns:
value of txt.getBytes(UTF8).length()
